scripts.generate-api-from-backend: rimraf ./src/api/* && curl https://api.4np.4players.de/b2b/v1/docs/api.json > ./backend/document.json && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./backend/document.json -g typescript -o ./src/api --additional-properties=fileNaming=kebab-case,withNodeImports=true,platform=deno --openapi-normalizer SET_TAGS_FOR_ALL_OPERATIONS=App
